description:
Rider of Red was originally Cabik Pentel`s Servant. His current Master is http://anidb.net/ch88727 [Shirou Kotomine].
[spoiler="True Name and Noble Phantasm"]His true name is Achilles, one of the famous heroes in the Trojan Wars. His mother was the immortal nereid Thetis, and his father, the mortal Peleus, was the king of the Myrmidons.
According to the Achilleid, when Achilles was born Thetis tried to make him immortal, by dipping him in the river Styx. However, he was left vulnerable at the part of the body by which she held him, his left heel. In another version of this story, Thetis anointed the boy in ambrosia and put him on top of a fire, to burn away the mortal parts of his body. She was interrupted by Peleus and abandoned both father and son in a rage.
His Noble Phantasm is Troias Trag≈çidia (Troy`s Tragedy), his war chariot that he can summon.[/spoiler]
Source: TYPE-MOON Wiki
